data.title: Dr. Henry Cuellar Elementary School
data.meta_description: Dr. Henry Cuellar Elementary School - We encourage our students to strive and believe in their ability to reach academic excellence and become successful leaders.
data.text:
The 21st Century Community Learning Centers (CCLC) is an out of school time program offered FREE OF CHARGE through a federal grant administered by the TEXAS ACE (After School Centers on Education) Department. The United ISD “Fit for the Future” program offers academic, leadership, and enrichment opportunities for students and families. Both Cycle 11 & 12 Elementary after-school programs offer assistance for students in Pre-K through 5th grade, while Cycle 12 Middle School Program provides services for 6th through 8th grade students. Bus services will be available throughout the course of the program.

United ISD is proud to introduce the federally funded 21st CCLC “Fit for the Future/ACE Academy” program for the following campuses:

“Fit for the Future/ACE Academy” will allow qualifying students to participate at no cost from 3:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m. Students will be provided with a light snack and engage in other program opportunities such as: Academic Assistance/Enrichment, Extracurricular Activities/Community Outreach Programs, STEM and Health/Wellness. In addition, the program will provide Family and Parental support such as: Positive Parenting Workshops, ESL and Certification Classes, Literacy Nights, and Workforce Training. For more information, please call 956-473-6301.

ENROLLMENT AND ATTENDANCE

21st CCLC program is provided FREE OF CHARGE to students (and their families). Students must, however, participate in the 21st CCLC Afterschool Program for at least 2 hrs of instructional time on a daily basis to begin after a student's snack/meal. Student pickup will start no earlier than 5:15 pm. If your child is going to be absent, please call the school office and ask to be transferred to the Site Facilitator so they can be notified, as well as communicate through Program ClassDojo.

FAMILY PARTICIPATION

Family involvement is a very important component of your child’s education. We encourage each adult family member to participate in this program as much as his/her schedule allows. Each month, we offer activities for both the parent and their child, or just for parents. The Family events are designed to involve parents as collaborators in their child’s educational journey.

En Español

INSCRIPCIÓN Y ASISTENCIA

El programa 21st CCLC se proporciona GRATIS a los estudiantes (y sus familias). Sin embargo, los estudiantes deben participar en el programa extraescolar 21st CCLC durante al menos 2 horas de instrucción diariamente para comenzar después de la merienda/comida del estudiante. La recogida de estudiantes comenzará no antes de las 5:15 p.m. Si su hijo va a estar ausente, llame a la oficina de la escuela y solicite que lo transfieran al Facilitador del sitio para que pueda ser notificado, así como comunicarse a través del Programa ClassDojo.

ARTICIPACIÓN FAMILIAR

La participación familiar es un componente muy importante de la educación de su hijo. Alentamos a cada miembro adulto de la familia a participar en este programa tanto como su horario lo permita. Cada mes, ofrecemos actividades tanto para los padres como para sus hijos, o solo para los padres. Los eventos familiares están diseñados para involucrar a los padres como colaboradores en el viaje educativo de sus hijos.

United I.S.D. After School Adventures is excited to utilize a new program called Eleyo for easy-to-navigate online registration and payments. This online system will enable you to register, check account balances, make payments using Visa, MasterCard or Discover, sign up for automated tuition payments, print receipts and childcare tax statements.

IMPORTANT!

Have all your child's information ready and plan on at least 15 minutes to complete the registration. Once started the information is not saved until completed

STEP BY STEP REGISTRATION INSTRUCTIONS

ELEYO REGISTRATION

El Programa After School Adventures de United I.S.D. se complace en anunciarle que utilizará un nuevo programa llamado Eleyo de fácil navegación para inscripciones y pagos en línea. Este sistema en línea le permitirá inscribir a sus hijos, revisar el saldo de su cuenta, hacer pagos utilizando tarjetas Visa, MasterCard o Discover, inscribirse para pagos automáticos de mensualidades, imprimir recibos y estados de impuestos por gastos de guardería.

!IMPORTANTE!

Tenga toda la información de su hijo lista y asigne al menos 15 minutos de su tiempo para completar el proceso de inscripción. Una vez que empiece, la información no será guardada hasta que termine el proceso.

INSTRUCCIONES PARA INCRIPCION PARA PADRES

INSCRIPCION DE ELEYO AQUÍ
